document.full_text: peru's presidential front-runner ollanta humala said on monday he would respect free-trade agreements and the central bank's independence as he tries to persuade voters he is no longer a left-wing hard-liner.
document.title: leading race, humala further softens tone in peru
lines_and_colors: peru's presidential front-runner ollanta humala said on monday he would respect free-trade agreements and the central bank's independence as he tries to persuade voters he is no longer a left-wing hard-liner.
